Package com.oop2.textalayzer

package com.oop2.textalayzer
  • Class
    Description
    ApiClient
    This interface, ApiClient, is designed to facilitate communication with the OpenAI API via HTTP POST requests.
    ApiClientInstance
    This class is responsible for providing an instance of the API client.
    ApiKeyProvider
    This class is responsible for retrieving the API key from a file.
    ApiRequest
    This class encapsulates an API request.
    ApiResponse
     
    ApiResponse.Choice
    This inner class represents a choice in the API response.
    ApiResponse.Choice.Message
    This inner class represents a message in a choice.
    ApiResponse.Usage
    This inner class represents the usage in the API response.
    ChooseActionActivity
    This class represents an Android Activity where users can choose an action to perform.
    DisplayResultActivity
    This class represents an Android Activity that displays the results of the Analysis task.
    EnterTextActivity
    This class represents an Android Activity where users can enter text.
    LoadPdfActivity
    This class represents an Android activity for loading a PDF file.
    MainActivity
    This class represents the main activity of the application.
